--------
# ITQ - NAFC G10 Roof Replacement
## Contract Information
-------------------

### Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: WS4022331909
* Solicitation Date: 2023-05-25
* Closing Date: 2023-06-13T14:00:00
* Amendment: 1

### Contract Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address:
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	+ City: Gatineau
	+ Province: Quebec
	+ Postal Code: K1A 0S5
	+ Country: Canada
* End User: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* End User Address:
	+ Address: 200 Kent Street
	+ City: Ottawa
	+ Province: Ontario
	+ Postal Code: K1A 0E6
	+ Country: Canada

### Tender Details

* Description: ITQ - NAFC G10 Roof Replacement
* Category: CNST
* Method of Procurement: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Newfoundland and Labrador
* Regions of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador

### Notice Information

* Notice Date: 2023-05-25
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16389817?extsite=MTYzODk4MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Nicole Fesseha
	+ Email: nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Access to Solicitation

* All interested suppliers may submit a qualification submission via SAP Ariba.
* Proposals must be submitted only via SAP Ariba by 3:00 PM ADT on June 13, 2023.
* It is recommended that bidders visit the site before submitting a bid.

 This contract is for the replacement of the roof of module G10 at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre in St. John's, NL. The estimated cost of this procurement is between $100,001 to $500,000. The contractor must perform and complete the work within 20 weeks of award. Enquiries should be submitted to the Contracting Authority using the Messages function in SAP
